resources.string: Quiz
It\'s a RAP quiz, hommie!

2. 50 Cent made the Junior Olympics as a Boxer
3. What rappers have a college degree?

5. At what age Tupac Shakur died?
6. Who was not a member of NWA?
7. James Brown’s “Funky Drummer” is the most sampled song in hip-hop. How many documented songs were sampling it?
8. Who wrote “Buggin” for Bugs Bunny on the Space Jam soundtrack?
